mapper.select: select cb_id, waybill_id, cb_state, cb_freight_type, cb_deliver_type, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Emp_Id from lms.fi_cash_bill where cb_id = #{cbId}

select cb_id, waybill_id, cb_state, cb_freight_type, cb_deliver_type, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Emp_Id from lms.fi_cash_bill limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into lms.fi_cash_bill(waybill_id, cb_state, cb_freight_type, cb_deliver_type, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Emp_Id) values (#{waybillId}, #{cbState}, #{cb_FreightType}, #{cbDeliverType}, #{addname}, #{addtime}, #{updatename}, #{updatetime}, #{deletename}, #{deletetime}, #{timeliness}, #{empId})

insert into lms.fi_cash_bill(waybill_id, cb_state, cb_freight_type, cb_deliver_type, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Emp_Id) values
(#{entity.waybillId}, #{entity.cbState}, #{entity.cb_FreightType}, #{entity.cbDeliverType}, #{entity.addname}, #{entity.addtime}, #{entity.updatename}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.deletename}, #{entity.deletetime}, #{entity.timeliness}, #{entity.empId})

insert into lms.fi_cash_bill(waybill_id, cb_state, cb_freight_type, cb_deliver_type, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Emp_Id) values
(#{entity.waybillId}, #{entity.cbState}, #{entity.cb_FreightType}, #{entity.cbDeliverType}, #{entity.addname}, #{entity.addtime}, #{entity.updatename}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.deletename}, #{entity.deletetime}, #{entity.timeliness}, #{entity.empId})
on duplicate key update waybill_id = values(waybill_id) , cb_state = values(cb_state) , cb_freight_type = values(cb_freight_type) , cb_deliver_type = values(cb_deliver_type) , AddName = values(AddName) , ADDTIME = values(ADDTIME) , UpdateName = values(UpdateName) , UpdateTime = values(UpdateTime) , DeleteName = values(DeleteName) , DeleteTime = values(DeleteTime) , TimeLiness = values(TimeLiness) , Emp_Id = values(Emp_Id)
mapper.update:
update lms.fi_cash_bill
waybill_id = #{waybillId},
cb_state = #{cbState},
cb_freight_type = #{cb_FreightType},
cb_deliver_type = #{cbDeliverType},
AddName = #{addname},
ADDTIME = #{addtime},
UpdateName = #{updatename},
UpdateTime = #{updatetime},
DeleteName = #{deletename},
DeleteTime = #{deletetime},
TimeLiness = #{timeliness},
Emp_Id = #{empId},
where cb_id = #{cbId}
